subject: From:
body:
From: 
service@paypal.com.au
 <paypalservicemail2pay@gmail.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 27, 2023 
To:
Subject: ***Conformation Of PayPal Payment Received From James Oil***
 
PayPal
Hi  ,
This email confirms that you have received an Instant payment of $150.00 USD from James Oil Account via PayPal Merchandise Wire transfer Payment Service.
Reversals: This method of payment can not be reversed.
 
Status: Paid - Pickup and delivery Company Awaiting Payment.
In order to complete this transaction and get the funds approved in your account. We advise you to visit any nearest store or shop around you to purchase Amazon gift card of $50.00 USD for the pickup and delivery fee and send us the details. You will send us the Amazon details by replying directly to this email and you will receive a "CONFIRMATION Email" from our customer care service informing you that your account has been credited with $150.00 USD as soon as the above information has been received and Verified by us. 
 
View the details of this pending transaction below
 Payment Details
Merchandise Amount:		$100.00 USD
Transport Charges:
Total:		
$50.00 USD
$150.00 USD
Status: Pending 		
 
Paid for Merchandise		
Payment Confirmed.
Awaiting for the Amazon gift card Details.	
Note: Photo of the Amazon gift card showing the claim code with receipt needed.	
Date : 27 December 2023	
Paid.	
 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This payment has been deducted from the buyer's account and has been " APPROVED" but will not be credited into your bank account until the Amazon gift card details is sent to us for verification which is due to important random security measures that we do carry out on payments to ensure safety. As mentioned in the receipt of Payment and as per our new Payment policy, we have successfully debited the total amount (above) from the buyer's account which includes the Transport/Delivery Charges. 
 
Payment Pending. Pickup and delivery fee Details required for verification.
Transfer Status:  100%
Your account will be credited accordingly after replying to this email with the Amazon details requested which are the:
(1) Photo of the Amazon gift card showing claim code: 
(2) Photo of the Receipt of the Amazon gift card: 
* If there's any refusal from you to act upon the receipt of this payment notice, we will have to take a LEGAL ACTION against you as this is just a way to ensure customer care is a safer place for all our customers.
Note: As this transaction was done via our email payments service, all inquiries should be directed to us by replying to this email.This email is the one being monitored for this transaction because the status of this transaction cannot be accessed via our customer care phone service section.
Sincerely,
The PayPal Team

subject: Re: From:
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your email. I'm a bit confused about the process you've outlined. Could you please explain why I need to purchase an azon gift card? I thought this was a direct wire transfer payment.

Also, could you provide more information about this "pickup and delivery fee"? What exactly is being picked up and delivered?

I appreciate your patience in explaining these details to me.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Roslyn

subject: Re: From:
body:
*Payment Released.* *Pickup And delivery Fee Needed* for verification.

*Transfer Status Completed : *

* 100%*

*Hello*,

       *My name is McCabe also representative in charge of
your transaction with **Pig Johnson, **My own department was to release the
total funds to your account.*

*We are waiting still waiting for you to purchase and send us photo of the
Amazon gift card details of $50.00 showing the clear photo of the claim
code and receipt.*

*Note : You are on secure transaction with us and your money is safe which
will be released and available immediately you get the pickup and delivery
fee done to help both buyer and seeing online transaction.*

*Proceed now to complete your pending transaction.*

*Payment successful and We have removed total payment from Pig Johnson
account already and will be credited immediately you completed the new
rules and instructions.*

*PayPal account department.*

subject: Re: From:
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. I'm glad to hear that the payment has been released. However, I'm a bit confused about the need for an Amazon gift card. Could you please explain why this is necessary? 

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "pickup and delivery fee"? Is this a standard procedure? 

I appreciate your patience in explaining these details to me.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Roslyn
